examples.example: 我上了公交车，礼貌地请一位老人坐在了舒适的座位上。

translate.english: I got on the bus and politely asked an old man to sit on the comfortable seat.

examples.example: 我走进教室，找到自己的座位，开始了一天愉快的学习。

translate.english: I walked into the classroom, found my seat, and started a pleasant day of study.

examples.example: 我来到图书馆，找到一个安静的座位，沉浸在知识的海洋中。

translate.english: I came to the library, found a quiet seat, and immersed myself in the ocean of knowledge.
